ISSUE.TITLE: Add Widget: always shows recent queries list, even after selection
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary Add Widget: always shows recent queries list, even after selection ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Edit and dashboard and open the "Add Widget" dialog. 2. Pick a query from recent queries or search for one and pick it. Current result: the recent queries list is still visible after selecting a query. Expected result: recent queries list should hide after selection.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Avoid timing out when no timeout is set (#4653) * soft limits should not exceed if they are set to run infinitely * use a variable to explain magic number
